note:
Data scientist/python programmer from Amsterdam.

Some things I like: affordable housing, human-centred infrastructure, science, history, sustainability and durability, right to repair, free & federated software, privacy, TTRPGs, good worldbuilding and characters, dated websites, copyleft.

Some things I don't like: fascism, racism, sexism, homophobia, transfobia, etc., misinformation, organised religion, corporate lobbying, profiteering, boto3, yamls that should have been code.

I'm a he.
